title: 新人的疑问
author: shallow_qy
txt_content: 用户名可以改吗？找了好久没看到改名字的按钮

replies.author: JJ怪大战
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: FloatingBlocks
replies.txt_content: 六级之后用绿宝石购买改名卡

replies.author: 小丛雨
replies.txt_content: 你要到6级才能买改名卡

replies.author: ranick
replies.txt_content: 要到六级，花绿宝石买

replies.author: 小敖丙
replies.txt_content: 当然可以改，好要用绿宝石

replies.author: mohui666
replies.txt_content: 六级买改名卡

replies.author: 西瓜牧牧2
replies.txt_content: 要6级才行

replies.author: Strange_name
replies.txt_content:
可以的，六级后用一绿宝石买改名卡。



@凛@喵

replies.author: 凛夜丶雨月
replies.txt_content: 可以改，要用绿宝石买改名卡

replies.author: 小鑫emm
replies.txt_content: 等6级 兄弟

replies.author: 凉凉丶
replies.txt_content: 可以改，6级之后用绿宝石买改名卡

replies.author: wzh123123
replies.txt_content: 可以哒，到6

replies.author: 甲壳虫Luca
replies.txt_content: 看看我的血泪史就有答案了https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-977030-1-1.html（6级绿宝石改名）

replies.author: 安少An_Shao
replies.txt_content: 六级之后可以改

replies.author: xiaoxuandada
replies.txt_content: 6级才能改.

replies.author: WarHawk
replies.txt_content: 你得有绿宝石

replies.author: 流年之间
replies.txt_content: 别疑问了 你用户名就是你账号了

replies.author: 诗钰啊
replies.txt_content: 可以，但是你得要绿宝石

replies.author: 泽先生鸭
replies.txt_content: 还要用绿宝石 太难了。

replies.author: xiaobbl
replies.txt_content: 可以的，但要氵到6级
